formalpara.title: Figure 2. Description of pPD95.75
formalpara.para: The multiple cloning site (MCS) of pPD95.75 spans from HindIII to MlsI. The reading frame upstream of GFP is indicated by alternating red and gray boxes. The artificial intron lies between the MCS and the GFP coding region (the ATG of GFP is indicated in green).
